title: Civil liberties scores- Russia and Mexico

content.question: Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Using the data in the graph, describe the trend in civil liberties in Russia between 1995 and 2015. Explain a possible reason for this trend. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about rule by law in Russia. (c) Explain why the score for civil liberties in Russia differs from the score for civil liberties in Mexico.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Using the data in the graph, describe the trend in civil liberties in Russia between 1995 and 2015. Explain a possible reason for this trend. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about rule by law in Russia. (c) Explain why the score for civil liberties in Russia differs from the score for civil liberties in Mexico.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
